parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  statements: [{
    statement: `
      MATCH (c:Client {id: $clientId})-[:OWNS]->(d:Device)
      OPTIONAL MATCH (t:Touchpoint)-[:ABOUT_DEVICE]->(d)
      WHERE t.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P1D')
      WITH d, max(t.timestamp) as lastMentioned, count(t) as mentionCount
      OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:HAS_PROBLEM]->(p:Problem {status: 'in_progress'})
      RETURN d.id as id, 
             d.brand as brand, 
             d.model as model, 
             d.owner_label as owner_label,
             lastMentioned,
             mentionCount,
             p IS NOT NULL as hasActiveRepair
      ORDER BY 
        CASE WHEN lastMentioned IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
        lastMentioned DESC,
        hasActiveRepair DESC,
        mentionCount DESC
    `,
    parameters: { clientId: $json.clientId }
  }]
}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({
  statements: [{
    statement: `
      MATCH (c:Client {id: $clientId})-[:OWNS]->(d:Device)
      WHERE ($brand IS NULL OR toLower(d.brand) CONTAINS toLower($brand))
        AND ($model IS NULL OR toLower(d.model) CONTAINS toLower($model))
        AND ($ownerLabel IS NULL OR toLower(d.owner_label) = toLower($ownerLabel))
      OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:HAS_PROBLEM]->(p:Problem)
      WHERE $problemType IS NULL OR p.type = $problemType
      OPTIONAL MATCH (t:Touchpoint)-[:ABOUT_DEVICE]->(d)
      WHERE t.timestamp > datetime() - duration('P1D')
      WITH d, 
           collect(DISTINCT {id: p.id, type: p.type, status: p.status}) as problems,
           max(t.timestamp) as lastMentioned,
           count(t) as mentionCount
      RETURN d.id as deviceId,
             d.brand as brand,
             d.model as model,
             d.owner_label as ownerLabel,
             problems,
             lastMentioned,
             mentionCount
      ORDER BY 
        CASE WHEN lastMentioned IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
        lastMentioned DESC,
        mentionCount DESC
    `,
    parameters: { 
      clientId: $json.clientId,
      brand: $json.extracted.brand,
      model: $json.extracted.model,
      ownerLabel: $json.extracted.ownerLabel,
      problemType: $json.extracted.problemType
    }
  }]
}) }}
